Look at section 41 of ordinance 29, and if I am wrong I ask the Minister of Justice to correct me. You cannot bring a separate school into existence under sec- tion 41 of that ordinance unless the minority moves. There can be no separate school without that. the draftsman. I think, Sir, it is now due from the member for Brandon to make an apology to the Minister of Justice for the manner in which he referred to the drafts- man upon that occasion. But, Mr. Speaker, I happen to be in a somewhat inquisitive mood to-night, and I would like to know who was the draughtsman of the proposed amendment to section 16 ? It was drawn by no ’prentice hand.
